pj_bool_t force_keyframe
 

Detailed Description

Encoding option.

Field Documentation

◆ force_keyframe

pj_bool_t pjmedia_vid_encode_opt::force_keyframe

Flag to force the encoder to generate keyframe for the specified input frame. When this flag is set, application can verify the result by examining PJMEDIA_VID_FRM_KEYFRAME flag in the bit_info field of the output frame.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • vid_codec.h
